name: Silver Lined Solutions
overview:
Silver Lined Solutions are specialist consultants in the Salesforce.com space - focusing on small companies who don’t have the budget or the ability to engage the large consultancy firms. Silver Lined Solutions is here to cater for the small players who seem to have been left behind in the mad rush to get bigger and bigger clients!

We can offer any or all of the following services: Simple ‘Clicks not code’ Salesforce.com Administration Bespoke Visual Force Page Creation Advanced Apex Class & Trigger Writing Requirements Analysis Workshops Phased Iterative Development Quality Assurance Onsite or Remote Consultancy Onsite or Remote Support Onsite or Remote Training

Due to the nature of the cloud and todays communication platforms, face to face meetings are not always a requirement. This means that although we are based in the UK we can safely say that we can help anyone on this tiny planet - timezone differences can sometimes be an advantage!

If you are a small company wanting to either understand or enhance your current implementation of Salesforce.com then please get in touch with us.
